comments.text:
Created attachment 9023931
policies.json

[Affected versions]:
Firefox 65.0a1 
Firefox 64.0b6 
Firefox 63.0.1
Firefox 60.3.0esr

[Affected platforms]:
Windows 10 64bit
macOS 10.14
Ubuntu 16.04 64bit

[Preconditions]:
1. Place the attached policies.json file inside the distribution folder or enable the "DisableProfileImport" policy via GPO. 

[Steps to reproduce]:
1. Launch Firefox with ./firefox -no-remote -p -migration.

[Expected result]:
The import wizard is not displayed.

[Actual result]:
The import wizard is displayed and data is successfully imported from other browsers.

[Regression range]:
I don't think that this is a regression.
comments.author: emil.ghitta@softvision.com
comments.creator: emil.ghitta@softvision.com

[Actual result]:

comments.text: I could fix this on Windows, but not on macOS or Linux. We haven't had this come up, so I'm going to WONTFIX for now.
comments.author: mozilla@kaply.com
